fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Duel (Day): Select a player. The following night, you will challenge them to a Atomic Blitz 3 | 2 chess game on chess.com. This duel shares the same rules as Atomic International Chess Grandmaster’s.
-Nuke (Night): Send a nuke to someone’s house. This is a rampage attack, but it is only Powerful, and visitors only take a Basic attack. 0 uses, gain 1 use each time you win a game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You can duel someone and send a nuke in the same night.
